item.title: GitHub Actions + AI Agent Auto-Fix Pipeline: Failure Tiers, Regression Gates, and Security Guardrails
item.description: When CI keeps failing, the real risk is not “slow fixes” — it is “fast bad fixes.” This guide gives you a practical GitHub Actions + AI Agent auto-fix pipeline with failure tiering, strict edit boundaries, and merge-time gates.

item.title: GitHub Actions + AI Agent 自动修复流水线：失败分级、回归测试与安全闸门
item.description: 线上 CI 一旦连续红灯，团队最怕的不是“修得慢”，而是“修坏更多”。 这篇给你一套可落地的 GitHub Actions + AI Agent 自动修复流水线：先做失败分级，再限制 AI 修改范围，最后用回归与安全闸门兜底。

item.title: GitHub Actions 自动部署 Hugo：防翻车配置与排障清单
item.description: 本地 hugo 能跑，到了 GitHub Actions 就翻车，是很多博客维护者的日常。 最常见的问题不是“不会写 workflow”，而是环境不一致、版本漂移、权限设置遗漏。

item.title: Hugo Auto Deploy with GitHub Actions: Safe Config and Troubleshooting
item.description: Your local hugo build works, but GitHub Actions fails randomly. Classic. The root cause is usually not the workflow syntax. It is environment drift, missing permissions, and unstable dependencies.
